mapper.insert: insert into inquire (INQUIRE_NUM, MEMBER_NUM, goods_num, INQUIRE_SUBJECT, INQUIRE_CONTENTS, INQUIRE_KIND, INQUIRE_DATE) values (#{inquireNum}, #{memberNum}, #{goodsNum}, #{inquireSubject}, #{inquireContents}, #{inquireKind}, sysdate())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM inquire WHERE INQUIRE_ANSWER IS NULL ORDER BY INQUIRE_DATE DESC LIMIT 10;
